page.title: 03CHURCH STRETTON CHURCHES
page.content: There are four churches in Church Stretton. One church is positioned at the beginning of Watling Street North. It is a Catholic church, and it is called{St Milburga's.}There is another church positioned two thirds of the way down Watling Street South. It is called{The Methodist Church.}There is a church up the main street (High Street). It is called{The United {Reformed Church.}It has been built for a hundred and nineteen years. Before it became{The United Reformed Church} it was a{Congregational Church.}The main church is positioned in the middle of Church Street. It is called{ {St Lawrence's Church.} All the churches are impressive inside, especially the{Parish Church.} Church Stretton was named Church Stretton because of its beautiful church.
